effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 20% chance to burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.  One of these effects is selected at random; they do not each have independent chances to occur.

flavorTexts.text:

attack. May also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
